data.name: Student_ImportStudent_Popup_DescriptiveText
data.value: Upload the excel file with student data in the required format. If you need a copy of the template, you can download it from here.

data.name: Reports_footnotes_NOTE_note1
data.value:
• Hours spent reading is the number of hours spent reading books on Kitablet.
  • Hours spent doing activities specifies the time spent doing activities that are there at the end of some of the books.
  • Hours spent browsing Kitablet captures the time spent on Kitablet besides reading a book or doing activities.
  • This report is for the specific filters chosen by you before generating the report. The filters can be modified from the 'Modify filters' section above the report.

data.name: Reports_footnotes_NOTE_note2
data.value:
• Number of books read by a student is the average calculated across the set of relevant students.
  • Time spent in a week by a student is the average time spent by the set of relevant students using Kitablet in a week.
  • This report is for the specific filters chosen by you before generating the report. The filters can be modified from the 'Modify filters' section above the report.

data.name: Reports_footnotes_NOTE_note3
data.value: Aenan vitae suscipit massa. Sed ac lorem vitae dolor fermentum dignissim.

data.name: Reports_Report1_DescriptiveText
data.value: Listing of users according to status - created but not registered, registered but havent logged in and active users. Users include School Teachers and Students. Can choose to see a particular user type/both and a particular school/all.

data.name: Reports_Report2_DescriptiveText
data.value: Usage of Kitablet by students - lets you choose the duration, location, school or grade for which you want to see the report. In the generated report, you can see usage grade wise, sub-section wise or student wise.

data.name: Reports_Report3_DescriptiveText
data.value: Usage of a particular book on Kitablet - lets you choose the duration, location and the particular book for which you want to see the report. In the generated report, you can see average time spent reading the book and %age of children who completed the book out of those who started reading it.

data.name: Reports_Report4_DescriptiveText
data.value: Usage of books on Kitablet at a publisher level - lets you choose the duration, location and the particular book for which you want to see the report. In the generated report, you can see average time spent reading the book and %age of children who completed the book out of those who started reading it.

data.name: Reports_Report5_DescriptiveText
data.value: Usage of Kitablet at a particular school compared to all schools - lets you choose the duration, location, school or grade for which you want to see the report. In the generated report, you can compare usage on number of books read and time spent in a week.

data.name: Reports_Report5_Noofbooksreadbyastudent
data.value: Number of books read by a student

data.name: Reports_Report5_TimeSpentinweekbyastudent
data.value: Time spent in a week by a student

data.name: Reports_Report6_DescriptiveText
data.value: Listing of books active in Kitablet - lets you narrow down the list 1st by sub-section and language. Gives all the basic details of a particular book.

data.name: Reports_Report7_DescriptiveText
data.value: Usage of Kitablet across platforms and environments - lets you choose the duration, location or school for which you want to see the report. In the generated report, you can see the usage overall, city wise or school wise.

data.name: Reports_Report7_UsageofKitabletinvariousenvironments
data.value: Usage of Kitablet in various environments

data.name: Reports_Report7_UsageofKitabletonvariousplatforms
data.value: Usage of Kitablet on various platforms

data.name: Reports_Report8_DescriptiveText
data.value: Usage of Kitablet by your children - lets you choose the duration and children for which you want to see the report. In the generated report, you can see usage student wise.

data.name: Student_BulkUpdate_DescriptiveText
data.value: First, please download the student data through 'Export' button. Update the data as needed. Ensure that you do not make any changes to 'UniqueID' field. After updating data, upload the new excel using 'Upload' button.
